thread.title_full: While Deepika Padukone was a golden girl at Shahid's party, Ranveer Singh looked like an alien : Fashion, News - India Today

title: While Deepika Padukone was a golden girl at Shahid's party, Ranveer Singh looked like an alien : Fashion, News - India Today
text:
Fashion While Deepika Padukone was a golden girl at Shahid's party, Ranveer Singh looked like an alien 
Rumoured lovers Ranveer Singh and Deepika Padukone's sartorial choices at Shahid Kapoor's pre-birthday bash were a drastic contrast to each other. IndiaToday.in | Posted by Mini Dixit 
With the brightest stars from the Bollywood industry in presence, Shahid Kapoor 's pre-birthday bash was quite a glittery affair. The shiniest probably being Shahid's Padmavati co-star, 
Ranveer Singh just stepped out wearing a blanket and nailed even that Also Read: Deepika's New York Fashion Week debut was gorgeous, except for this tiny part 
Dressed in a simple black H&M tank top paired with gold metallic pants from 3.1 Phillip Lim, Deepika's outfit struck just the right chords. Ditching accesories for a minimalistic look complete with a sleek low ponytail, Deepika looked elegant and trendy. Photo: Yogen Shah 
On the contrary, actor and Deepika's rumoured beau, Ranveer Singh, decided to be his usual unpredictable self at the do. Apart from being confusing, Ranveer's outfit was what looked like a hooded unitard, only it had flared bottoms. Photo: Yogen Shah 
And strangely-yet-understandably enough, Ranveer managed to pull this off too. Yeah well, when it's Ranveer Singh we're talking about, he manages to nail practically everything, doesn't he?
